title: Karen Bass, vowing unity, takes oath as L.A.'s mayor
description: Former U.S. Rep. Karen Bass vowed Sunday night to pursue unity as she took oath as the 43rd mayor of  Los Angeles.

title: Crews in Kansas contain the largest-yet breach of the Keystone Pipeline

title: NASA chief: SpaceX leader says Elon Musk’s Twitter drama is ‘nothing to worry about’
description: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson received assurances from the head of SpaceX that Elon Musk's Twitter drama is "nothing to worry about."
